coreActions.label: Core Combat Options (Any Playable Character)
coreActions.description: These actions are available to all characters during combat

actions.name: Strike
actions.description: Make an attack with a weapon or natural attack
actions.mechanic: Roll to hit vs target AR

actions.name: Parry
actions.description: Block a melee strike you can see coming

actions.name: Dodge
actions.description: Avoid an incoming attack by moving—works vs melee or missiles

actions.name: Move / Reposition
actions.description: Step, sprint, vault cover, change elevation, close or open distance

actions.name: Draw / Ready / Reload
actions.description: Swap weapons, ready an item, string an arrow, crank a crossbow, etc.

actions.name: Aim / Called shot
actions.description: Spend an action to line up a careful hit (trade speed for precision/location)

actions.name: Defend / Hold action
actions.description: Delay an attack to react later in the round
actions.mechanic: Set trigger condition, execute when triggered

actions.name: Disengage / Withdraw
actions.description: Back out of melee to avoid free shots
actions.mechanic: Opposed check to avoid opportunity attacks

actions.name: Combat Maneuvers
actions.description: Simple maneuvers to break guard, knock prone, or bat a weapon away

actions.name: Use a skill in combat
actions.description: Prowl to slip away, Climb to gain height, First Aid under fire, etc.

actions.name: Use an item
actions.description: Drink a potion, throw oil, drop caltrops, light a torch, use a scroll

actions.name: Cast a spell
actions.description: Pick a known spell, pay its cost/time, and resolve its effect

actions.name: Invoke a miracle
actions.description: Use your class's healing/banishing/blessing powers as allowed

actions.name: Use psionics
actions.description: Spend I.S.P. to activate a psychic power and resolve it

bonuses.name: Multiple Attacks
bonuses.description: More attacks per melee as you level (you can do more of the core options each round)
bonuses.mechanic: Gain additional attacks per melee round at higher levels

bonuses.name: Combat Bonuses
bonuses.description: Bigger combat bonuses (to strike, parry, dodge, damage)
bonuses.mechanic: Higher bonuses to all combat rolls

bonuses.name: Special Moves
bonuses.description: Unlocked by level: kick attacks, stun results on high natural rolls, and critical strikes on wider ranges

bonuses.name: Shield Mastery
bonuses.description: Better parries and the option to bash or throw a shield
bonuses.mechanic: Improved shield AC, shield bash attack

bonuses.name: Weapon Proficiencies
bonuses.description: Accuracy/rate-of-fire boosts; melee profs add strike/parry; missile profs add shots/round

bonuses.name: Mounted Combat
bonuses.description: Lance charges, extra damage while riding, better parry/dodge on horseback

bonuses.name: Positioning Advantage
bonuses.description: Big upsides for attacking from behind (sneak/ambush), and some classes expand 'critical from behind' multipliers as they level
bonuses.mechanic: Backstab damage bonuses, expanded critical ranges

bonuses.name: Control Tools
bonuses.description: Trips, dirty tricks, garrotes, poison use (where allowed by class/alignment)
bonuses.mechanic: Special combat maneuvers, dirty fighting techniques

bonuses.name: Ranged Superiority
bonuses.description: Higher rates of fire, better aimed shots, and class-specific crit improvements with bows
bonuses.mechanic: Multiple shots per round, improved ranged attack bonuses

bonuses.name: Action Economy Management
bonuses.description: Some spells are fast 'combat actions'; others take longer—plan your round around casting times
bonuses.mechanic: Variable casting times affect combat strategy

bonuses.name: Healing and Buffs
bonuses.description: Lay on hands/heal, remove conditions, bless allies, turn/banish undead or demons when applicable

naturalSpecial.label: Natural & Special Cases (Racial or OCC features)

bonuses.name: Natural Weapons
bonuses.description: Claws/bites/gore attacks for those who have them

bonuses.name: Enhanced Senses & Mobility
bonuses.description: Nightvision, tracking, climbing/flying/sprinting—use these to control range and advantage

bonuses.name: Resistances/Saves
bonuses.description: Some races/classes halve fire/cold, ignore mundane weapons, or get better saves—lean into those when choosing tactics

turnFlow.label: How a Turn Typically Flows

steps.description: Pick a target or position goal
Spend one of your attacks per melee to do one thing (strike, cast, move+strike, parry/dodge as needed, etc.)
Repeat until you're out of attacks. Defensive parries/dodges also cost attacks, so budget!

tips: Budget your attacks—parries and dodges also consume them

quickReferenceTips.budgeting: Every character has a limited number of attacks per melee round - use them wisely
quickReferenceTips.positioning: Get behind enemies for backstab bonuses, use cover, control elevation
quickReferenceTips.timing: Hold actions for perfect moments, interrupt enemy spells, coordinate attacks
quickReferenceTips.resourceManagement: Track I.S.P., spell slots, daily abilities, and consumables
quickReferenceTips.environmental: Use oil, caltrops, lighting, and terrain to your advantage
quickReferenceTips.teamwork: Coordinate defensive positioning, healing, and combo attacks
